successfulSentence: Such expressiveness! Unparalelled creativity! I'm glad I got to share this moment with you.
failedSentence: Come on, I'm sure you can do better than that.
waitingSentence: Show me how you see this landscape.

sentences: Oh, hi there! It's been a while since I last met anyone new here.
Let's get to know each other!
What do you like the most, crispy cold or toasty warmth?
Interesting! Since you're such a cool artist, why don't you paint a nice and chilly portrait of this landscape?
Interesting! Since you're a smoking hot artist, why don't you paint a nice and warm portrait of this landscape?
